name: Up Up The Tower
description:
ARE YOU READY FOR THE SUPER AMAZING RAGE PLATFORMER                                UP UP THE TOWER???

if yes then you can download it right here on this very website ;)

if no then... .. .  you can still download it just so you can uninstall it afterwards :)

Up Up The Tower is a platformer all about going UP

Controls: 

You can walk on A and D or Left and Rigth or Use a controller

You can Jump on W or UP or SPACEBAR or use A on a controller

You can use your SPECIAL POWER on  Ctrl or X on a controller

You can interact with levers and doors press E or SHIFT or B on a controller
